names.english: transforming phlegm and dissipating binding decoction
names.commonEnglish: Transforming Phlegm and Dissipating Binding Decoction

actions: Spreads Liver Qi, breaks up Stagnant Qi, dissipates accumulations, dries Dampness and transforms Phlegm.
Dries Dampness, transforms Phlegm, dissipates nodules and reduces Stagnation.
Promotes urination,leaches out dampness, strengthens the Spleen and transforms Phlegm.
Extinguishes Wind, stops spasms and convulsions, transforms Phlegm, softens hardness, eliminates toxins and dissipates nodules.
Invigorates the Blood, expels Blood Stasis, nourishes the Liver and Kidney Yin, strengthens the sinews and bones and benefits the joints.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and expels Wind-Dampness from the channels.
Promotes the movement of Qi, disseminates the flow in the channels and collaterals, and transforms Phlegm.
With Qing Pi, for flank pain and chest and abdominal distention due to Liver Qi Stagnation.
